power.title: Bloodied Resurgence
power.fluff: When you call upon your hidden reserves, you evoke the same new will in your allies

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You spend a healing surge

section.name: Target:
section.text: Each ally in the burst that can see you

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Each target gains temporary hit points equal to your Charisma modifier.
If you are bloodied, the temporary hit points increase by 5.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: 4 + your Charisma modifier temporary hit points.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 8 + your Charisma modifier temporary hit points.

power.title: Bounding Stride
power.fluff: You lope across the battlefield, your wounds fueling your stride

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You move your speed + 2 and ignore difficult terrain during the move.
If you are bloodied, you move your speed + 4 or your speed + the number of healing surges you have expended, whichever is greater.

power.title: Combat Sprint
power.fluff: Having saved a bit of strength for just this moment, you burst across the battlefield

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You move your speed + 2, and have a +2 bonus to all defenses against attacks triggered by this movement and ignore difficult terrain during the move.
If you are bloodied, you instead have a +4 bonus to defenses.
If you end this movement adjacent to an enemy that was at least 3 squares away from you when you started, you gain a +1 bonus to your first attack roll against that enemy.

power.title: Feral Rejuvenation
power.fluff: You call on the spirits to stitch your wounds, proudly displaying the blood you have spilled in their names

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: Your attack damages an enemy

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You spend a healing surge and regain hit points equal to your healing surge value.
If the triggering attack bloodied at least one enemy, you regain additional hit points equal to your Constitution modifier.

If the triggering attack reduced at least one enemy to 0 hit points or less, you regain additional hit points equal to one-half your level + your Constitution modifier. This is not cumulative with bloodying an enemy.

power.title: Ignore Pain
power.fluff: When your enemies hurt you, the strength of your spirit allows you to shove the pain aside for a time

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You take damage

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You gain temporary hit points equal to the triggering damage.

If the triggering damage reduced you to 0 hit points or less, you do not immediately become dying. You instead become dying after you have completed your next turn, or when you no longer have these temporary hit points, whichever comes first.

power.title: Primal Vitality
power.fluff: Drawing strength from the ground beneath your feet, you push away the pain of minor wounds

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You regain a number of hit points equal to one-half your level + your Constitution modifier.

section.name: Raging:
section.text: The number of hit points regained increases to one-half your level + twice your Constitution modifier.

power.title: Savage Combeback
power.fluff: You break free of what hinders you, ignoring the injury you suffer in the process

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You are conscious and fail a saving throw

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You take damage equal to one-half your level and succeed on the triggering saving throw.
